item.description:
I'll be at Maddy's in Saugus on April 13th.  Show starts at 8:
00.  No Cover Charge.  I don't know what time I'll be on.

How to find us:  Table for Maria Meetup.

Maria Petro 978-239-0963

OPEN MIC - Live Music & Comedy @8:00PM
Come hungry - FREE ITALIAN BUFFET @7:30PM & A GREAT BAR MENU!
Sing, play and jam with other musicians and network with other
comedians at the Open Mic on Wednesday nights at Maddy's in
Saugus, MA.  Located after the the Rte1 South/Rte 99 Junction after the mini
golf place/orange dinosaur. (Formerly the Blue Star.)
Come on down network, socialize, contribute and hang with us.
Play solo or with the band or perform your comedy set. All
instruments, singers, and styles are welcome. NO COVER Charge.

1639 Broadway
Saugus, MA
www.MaddysLounge.com
item.why: Group member Maria is performing her standup comedy
item.name: Stand Up Comedy and Music and free food - Maddy's on Rt. 1 in Saugus -no cover!
